HERO_DESCRIPTION: Libre Closet is a free, open-source, self-hosted wardrobe organizer. Catalog your clothes, build outfits, and keep your style data on your own server.
FEATURES_TITLE: Everything you need, nothing you don't
FEATURE_PRIVACY_DESC: Your wardrobe data never leaves your server. No tracking, no ads, no third parties.
FEATURE_PWA_DESC: Install to your home screen and use it without an internet connection.
FEATURE_OUTFITS_DESC: Combine garments into outfits and browse your complete looks in one place.
FEATURE_DOCKER_DESC: Self-host in seconds with Docker. Your data, your infrastructure.
SELF_HOST_DESC: Run Libre Closet on your own server, NAS, or Raspberry Pi with a single Docker command.
SELF_HOST_NOTE: See the README for docker-compose and environment variable options.
